@graph.keywords: privacy policy, personal data, cookies, comments, user rights, data retention, GDPR, website privacy, data collection, spam detection

about.name: Cookies
about.description: Data storage mechanism for user preferences and login information

about.name: Personal Data
about.description: User information collected and processed by the website

about.name: EXIF GPS Data
about.description: Location metadata embedded in uploaded images

mainEntity.name: What data do we collect from comments?

acceptedAnswer.text: We collect the data shown in the comments form, visitor's IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection
Comment cookies last for one year, login cookies last for two days, screen options cookies last for a year, and Remember Me extends login to two weeks

mainEntity.name: Who do we share your data with?

acceptedAnswer.text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email

mainEntity.name: How long do we retain your data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Comments and metadata are retained indefinitely, user profile information is stored and can be managed by users and administrators

mainEntity.name: What rights do you have over your data?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can request an exported file of personal data we hold about you and request erasure of personal data, except data required for administrative, legal, or security purposes

mainEntity.name: Where do we send your data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service

@graph.name: Hash
@graph.description: An anonymised string created from your email address

@graph.name: Embedded Content
@graph.description: Content from other websites included in articles such as videos, images, and articles
